biotools.summary: DisoRDPbind is a web predictor of disorder-mediated RNA, DNA and protein binding regions. DisoRDPbind predicts the RNA-, DNA-, and protein-binding residues located in the intrinsically disordered regions.

bioschemas.name: DisoRDPbind
bioschemas.summary: DisoRDPbind is a web predictor of disorder-mediated RNA, DNA and protein binding regions. DisoRDPbind predicts the RNA-, DNA-, and protein-binding residues located in the intrinsically disordered regions.
